title: Idle Inventor
description: Idle Inventor is an idle game where you can build and expand your industrial empire, becoming a titan of heavy machinery and industry. Manage 5 unique factories with various vehicles, including cars, planes, and spacecraft. Hire managers, automate production lines, and complete exciting missions to grow your factory and earn profits even while you're away. Experience the thrill of being an idle tycoon and watch your empire flourish in this addictive and rewarding game!
